rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a north-facing door and large floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, in line with Vastu principles.
Open-plan living area merging the kitchen and dining space. The layout ensures energy flow as per Vastu by maintaining a balanced north entrance direction.
Spacious master bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and ventilation. Designed following Vastu principles for peace and calm.
Small yet functional living space adjoining the master bedroom for servant convenience. Adheres to local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
